# Preface {-}

* Chapter 1, *[Introduction]*, gives an introduction on reproducibility and
  research compendium.

* Chapter 2, *[Build up project]*, shows the necessary steps to build up a
  file structure of research compendium using {usethis} from stretch.

* Chapter 3, *[Parametric simulations]*, demonstrates a workflow of parametric
  building energy simulation using EnergyPlus via {eplusr} and data analytics
  using {tidyverse}

* Chapter 4, *[Literate programming]*, shows an example of drafting a simple
  manuscript using the Elsevier LaTeX template via {rticles}

* Chapter 5, *[Workflow automation]*, demonstrates the power of the {targets}
  package on automating reproducible workflow in a Make-like pipeline.

* Chapter 6, *[Computational environment]*, lists necessary steps to capturing the
  computational environment using {renv} and Docker.

* Chapter 7, *[Sharing the compendium]*, gives suggestions on how to sharing your
  search compendium using GitHub.
